com.terremark
Interface TerremarkClient

public interface TerremarkClient

Terremark client interface. All anonymous API calls (getSupportedVersions() and getTime()) are defined here. This interface also defines methods to get various types of handlers. A handler providers a collection on API methods calls grouped together by category.

Author:
Seshu Pasam
See Also:
TerremarkFactory.getClient(com.terremark.config.PropertiesBuilder)

          Returns the current end point server time.
